data.name: Animalistic
data.detailed_description:
Animalistic is a fast-paced and ultraviolent shooter that fuses together the feel of both classic and modern FPS games.
As the last human on earth, it is your duty to ferociously wipe out the remaining animals that are hunting you down.


Pick from an arsenal of different weapons and your fists to brutally clear room after room of difficult yet fun-to-fight enemies.
Animalistic's fluid gameplay allows for ultra-fast movement and combat.


Animalistic will launch with 13 handcrafted levels with free content coming soon after launch! The levels are small but very detailed, stylish, and challenging.
Upgrade your stats and high scores for each level and unlock fun and unique achievments.


Play alongside a custom soundtrack created specifically for this game!

data.short_description: Animalistic is a fast-paced, ultraviolent, and stylish indie FPS game where you brutally clear room after room of creepy humanoid animals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2.50Ghz Intel core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5750 1GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Bloody yet stylized FPS violence towards humanoid animals.
